body.name: Mini GPS Tracker for Vehicles/Mini Magnetic GPS Device Real time Car Locator, Full USA Coverage, No Monthly Fee, Long Standby GSM SIM GPS Tracker for Trucks/Person 2024
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Track Record】-Use magnetic Mini GPS tracker to record 24 hours, sound monitoring, mini tracker is easy to conceal, combine security, tracking, monitoring, emergency alarm, management and many other functions, support cell phone remote control, provide a secure tracking device for your vehicle assets, elderly, children, spouse, pets, etc.

【Real-Time Location】-Dial the SIM card number, you can hear the sound around this tracker, in the absence of light and noise, you can monitor what is happening around the tracker device, quietly and secretly.

【Mini Magnetic Design]- GPS tracker small (1.57x0.91x0.61in) light (1.06oz), magnetic housing waterproof and rainproof, built-in two strong magnetic magnets, firmly attached to the vehicle, will not fall off easily.

【Easy To Use】-All you need to do is prepare a valid SIM card (Note!!! Our product does not include SIM card,you need to prepare it yourself), then insert the car tracker and you can track and map in real time via the Internet (with Google Maps)

【Long Life Practical】-Long life, tracking device works with smartphone, updates location every 30 seconds, 1, 5, 10 minutes, superb battery life, designed to track the location of lost elderly, children, pets, luggage, purses and vehicles (rental cars, trucks, motorcycles, boats, etc.)

【100% Customer Satisfaction】-Your high-quality buying experience and good use experience are our goals. of course, If you have any questions after purchasing our products . We will solve your problem immediately.
body.description: Product Name: Mini Magnetic GPS Tracker **Usage Instructions:** *(Steps 1-3 are prerequisites for correct use of the GPS device, so please follow the sequence of 1-2-3)* 1. **Preparation:** - The device does not include a SIM card and storage card, so please prepare a 2G network SIM card and mini memory card in advance. 2. **Power On:** - Open the card cover, insert the SIM card as indicated, and insert the mini memory card. The product will automatically power on, and the red light will flash four times before turning off. After 30 seconds, it enters normal standby mode. *(If the indicator light does not turn on after inserting the SIM card, charge the device with the SIM card inserted. Note: Charging without a SIM card is prohibited!)* 3. **Bind the Master Control Number:** - Send a text message "000" to the locator's number, and the device will reply with a text message. Send "Set; Bind + Master Control Number" to complete the binding. 4. **GPRS Location Query:** - Send a text message "777" to the locator's number. The device will reply with the geographical location and a Google Maps link. Open the link on your phone for accurate location details. 5. **Location Trajectory Query:** - Send a text message "102" to the locator's number. The device will reply with [account, password]. Log in to www.gpsfcst.com to view real-time location information. 6. **GPS Device Status:** - Send a text message "888" to the locator's number. The device will reply with information about the main functions, battery capacity, bound numbers, signal strength, startup frequency, GPRS TF card capacity, etc. 7. **Restart the Main Unit:** - Send a text message "999" to the locator's number and wait for 1 minute for successful restoration. 8. **Shutdown and Information Display Stop:** - Send a text message "444" to the locator's number. The device will reply with "Reset; All task
